Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Bar inkih salaatah sol barak dagom akke waytek
Barak garab sol, hinnay garabak dagom cab
Hinnay garabat osisaay, Qhuraan caatih cubbusak akriy
Nabiyow Diggah Nanu qilsi maxco (Qhuraan kinnuk) kol oobisenno
Diggah barak gimo aban salat kee qibaada sorkocobbaxa kaxxam raatissaah maxcô baxxaqqaa kee diggah aysuk raqta
Nabiyow ku Rabbih migaq cusaay, isi qibaadah kaâ fanah aggiriqiyyah iggiriqqiy
Usuk ayrô mawqaa kee ayrô kormâ Rabbi, kaak sa cakkil yaqbuden Yalli mayanak, toysa keltiyyah kaal kelit
Kaadu koros koo kee ku diinik ittaamal isbiraay qaxmeqe cabtih ken cab
Kaadu Nabiyow yoo kee tama yaayoota dirabboysa maray niqmatat yani ittah cabaay! Dago wakti keenih ab
Diggah usun ni garil axoowaa kee jaciim deqgsitta girá lon
Kaadu uma maaqoy serko ley katlak oobe waytaa kee ken qansarissa digaalá lon
Baaxoó kee qaleelá tangayye ayróy, qaleelá caxitta burta takke
Diggah nanu makki korosey farmoytay (Nabii Mucammad csati kinnuk) sin taamoomil sumaaqita siinî fanah rubne, firqawnâ fanah farmoyta (Nabii Muusa kinnuk) kah rubne innaah
Tokkel firqawni too farmoyta cineeh, gibdi digaaláh kaa digaalle
Toysa sinni nafsi too digaalak mannal catetton, meesi gibdah urru amqadoytit abta ayró, (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) tengeddeenik
Woo ayro meesî gibdah qaran qanxixah, Yalli is tamaatu waytaamah hee xagni yamaatuwaam raq mali
Diggah ta aayoota sinaamah kassiisik, toysa qakkaloowaah, isi nafsih maqaané faxe num isi Rabbî fanah gita yabbaxay Yallak meesii kee taaqatal
